block.p: American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed OF Jeremy Giambi on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Eric Byrnes from Sacramento of the PCL. SEATTLE MARINERS--Placed OF Jay Buhner on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF-INF Raul Ibanez from Tacoma of the PCL.

American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed OF Jeremy Giambi on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Eric Byrnes from Sacramento of the PCL. SEATTLE MARINERS--Placed OF Jay Buhner on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF-INF Raul Ibanez from Tacoma of the PCL.
National Basketball Association DETROIT PISTONS--Acquired F Billy Owens from the Milwaukee Bucks for G Lindsey Hunter.
National Hockey League NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Announced Puck Holdings has completed the purchase of the team. Named Kurt Kleinendorst assistant coach.

CAROLINA PANTHERS--Released DL Alton Weaver and WR Octavus Barnes. Placed LB Spencer Reid on injured reserve. CHICAGO BEARS--Waived DL Chris Mims, DE James Cotton, RB Marlion Jackson, RB Chad Levitt, WR Ahmad Merritt, WR Dee Miller, WR Pat Palmer, OL Damon Nivens, OL Uzooma Okeke, OL Gannon Shepherd, OL Brad Williams, DT Jerome King, CB Todd McMillon and P Aron Langley. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived P Brad Costello. Placed CB Charles Fisher on the physically unable to perform list. DALLAS COWBOYS--Placed CB Kevin Smith on reserved-retired list. Traded WR Jeff Ogden to Miami for future seventh-round draft pick. Released RB Michael Black. DENVER BRONCOS--Waived RB John Avery, FB Ryan Christopherson, DE Jerome Davis, DT Nathan Davis, T Allen DeGraffenreid, CB William Hampton and CB Jason Suttle. Placed WR Muneer Moore on injured reserve. Placed LB Chris Jones and C Jason Watts on the non-football injury list. DETROIT LIONS--Claimed RB Ken Oxendine off waivers from the Atlanta Falcons. Placed RB Reuben Droughns and CB Kevin Abrams on injured reserve. Released TE Steve Brominski, CB Andre' Dixon, WR Damien Dodson, G Paul Janus, G Jeremy Mankins, LB Joe O'Neill, DT Sean Powell, DE Quinton Reese, RB Charlie Sanders and DE Paul Spicer. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Traded P John Baker to the St. Louis Rams for an undisclosed draft choice. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Waived CB Corey Chamblin, LB Matt Finkes, WR Damon Gibson, WR Lenzie Jackson, G Kevin Landolt, DE Chris White, WR James Battle, FB Trevor Bollers, RB Leroy Collins, G Eric Moss and QB Roderick Robinson, TE Brandon Christenson, DT Ryan Reilly and C Eric Thomas. Signed TE Rod Monroe. KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Waived C Aaron Graham, TE Kirk McMullen and WR Wasswa Serwanga. Placed WR Joe Perez on injured reserve. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Placed WR Lamar Thomas on injured reserve. Placed WR McDuffie on the physically unable to perform list. Placed DE Adewale Ogunleye on the non-football injury-physically unable to perform list. Released TE Hayward Clay, TE Terrance Huston, G Steve Herndon, WR Kevin McKenzie, QB Gus Ornstein, FB Pete Sylvester and LB Scott Zimmerman. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed LB Donta Jones to a one-year contract. Placed TE Cam Cleeland on injured reserve and G Mike Halapin on the reserve-physically unable to perform list. Waived WR P.J. Franklin, WR Sherrod Gideon, DT Robert Brannon, DT Winfield Garnett, DT Demond Gibson, LB Jamal Brooks, TE Cuncho Brown, QB Marc Bulger, S Pete Destefano, K Shayne Graham, P Bill LaFleur, LB Donnie Spragan, T Jay Hagood and DE Alfred Williams. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Released WR Troy Smith and RB Edwin Watson. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Placed RB Garrison Hearst on the physically unable to perform list. Placed C Chris Dalman on injured reserve. Placed LB London Dunlap and RB Griff Yates on the injured reserve/minor injury list. Waived TE Trey Pennington. TENNESSEE TITANS--Placed CB Donald Mitchell, S Brandon McLemore and RB DeMario Brown on injured reserve. Placed TE Larry Brown and WR Lenny Ware on the physically unable to perform list and S Brad Ware on the non-football injury-physically unable to perform list.
